description: Vice President of Sales, Enterprise Software About the Company Acclaimed international provider of information technology services & solutions Industry Information Services Type Public Company Founded 1836 Employees 10,001 Categories Finance Information Services Mobile Software Publishing Financial Services Accounting Services Consulting & Professional Services Information Technology & Services Specialties software tools & digital information workflow solutions mobile point-of-use applications and high-quality content across multiple professional markets Business Classifications SAAS B2B About the Role The company, a leading international provider of information technology services and solutions, is seeking a Vice President Global Sales for their Enterprise Software division. The successful candidate will be responsible for driving sales and revenue generation activities on a global scale, with a focus on strong growth and maintaining high customer satisfaction to minimize churn. This role requires close collaboration with the global partner ecosystem and ensuring the efficiency of the sales and revenue-generating parts of the organization. The VP Sales will also work closely with other global functions such as marketing, product management, and customer success, and will be supported by HR, finance, and legal teams. Applicants must have a Bachelor's degree (MBA preferred) and at least 10 years of experience in sales management, including financial, operational, and people management responsibilities, within the Enterprise software business. The role demands a commercial mindset, cross-cultural experience, and the ability to lead and inspire global sales teams. Key responsibilities include managing global sales teams, developing deep market knowledge, translating business strategy into action, driving sales discipline, and ensuring forecast accuracy. The VP Sales will also be expected to represent the company at conferences and similar events, and to pursue operational efficiency while expanding subscription/cloud revenue generation. Superior communication skills, executive presence, and proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and Salesforce CRM are essential.
